className.description: Additional classes added to the login main body's form

helperText.description: Content displayed in the helper text component * (React component or element)

helperTextIcon.description: Icon displayed to the left in the helper text (React component or element)

hidePasswordAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the hide password button

isLoginButtonDisabled.description: Flag indicating if the login button is disabled

isPasswordRequired.description: Flag indicating if password is required

isRememberMeChecked.description: Flag indicating if the remember me checkbox is checked.

isShowPasswordEnabled.description: Flag indicating if the user can toggle hiding the password

isValidPassword.description: Flag indicating if the password is valid

isValidUsername.description: Flag indicating if the username is valid

loginButtonLabel.description: Label for the log in button input

noAutoFocus.description: Flag to indicate if the first dropdown item should not gain initial focus

onChangePassword.description: Function that handles the onChange event for the password (Function: (event: React.FormEvent<HTMLInputElement>, value: string) => void)

onChangeRememberMe.description: Function that handles the onChange event for the remember me checkbox (Function: (event: React.FormEvent<HTMLInputElement>, checked: boolean) => void)

onChangeUsername.description: Function that handles the onChange event for the username (Function: (event: React.FormEvent<HTMLInputElement>, value: string) => void)

onLoginButtonClick.description: Function that is called when the login button is clicked (Function: (event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLButtonElement, MouseEvent>) => void)

passwordLabel.description: Label for the password input field

rememberMeLabel.description: Label for the remember me checkbox that indicates the user should be kept logged in.  If the label is not provided, the checkbox will not show.

showHelperText.description: Flag indicating the helper text is visible *

showPasswordAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the show password button

usernameLabel.description: Label for the username input field
